name: pseudonymity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the use of a different name from your real name, especially on something you have written: Much of the web is dominated by anonymity and pseudonymity. Her friends living in the police state are cloaked in pseudonymity for their own safety.
More examplesFewer examplesSince his art is technically illegal, pseudonymity is vitally important. There are three levels to consider: complete anonymity, pseudonymity, and identifiability. As the website's head of communities, she is interested in what might be done with pseudonymity.
